name: Elizabeth Wright

responses.introduction: Hello! Open your books at page... Oh wait, I'm not teaching now.
responses.Big Footprint: Yes, that seems like my feet size.
responses.Small Footprint: My feet are bigger than that!
responses.Glasses: No, I don't wear glasses, otherwise I would be able to see my students.
responses.Bag: Yes, I have to carry spare textbooks for the silly students that forget them.
responses.Lipstick: I'm not a savage, of course I wear lipstick.
responses.Dark Hair: I quite like my dark hair actually.
responses.Light Hair: No, no, that is not my hair
responses.Rubber Duck: Aww cute duck, Richard would love it!

noneResponses: Sorry, I have to get on with marking.
Sorry, I've got some lesson planning to do
